DOC.brief_summary: The primary purpose compare patency two different type biliary metal stent , i.e . cover versus uncovered Nitinella metal stent . Secondary purpose determine frequency complication two group , e.g . cholecystitis , pancreatitis , cholangitis .
DOC.brief_title: Biliary Metal Stent Study : Metal Stents Management Distal Malignant Biliary Obstruction
DOC.criteria: 20 year age old oral write information give informed consent obtain clinical data accordance malignant bile duct obstruction ultrasonography sign extrahepatic malignant common bile duct obstruction typical radiological finding ERCP malignant common bile duct stenosis proximal margin bile duct stenosis least 2 cm hepatic confluence bilirubin > 50 micromol/L radical surgery estimate possible ( temporary stenting insertion plastic stent obtain replace metal stent within 4 week first ERCP procedure , patient randomize time insertion metal stent ) patient active hepatitis hepatic disease may cause jaundice inform consent obtain metastasis numerous significant intrahepatic stenosis cause blockage one segment liver ( segment blockage , liver metastasis exclusion criterion ) patient probably candidate surgical resection suspicion nonmalignant bile duct obstruction , e.g . stone benign stenosis ( initiate investigation ) proximal end stenosis locate within 2 cm hepatic confluence patient previously undergone BII RouxenY gastric resection , significant duodenal obstruction make ERCP difficult previously ( 4 week earlier ) treat bile duct stent severe coagulation disturbance ( PKINR > 1.6 )
